## Shape.TopInch property

Represents the vertical offset of shape from its top row, in unit of inches.

```csharp
public double TopInch { get; set; }
```

### Examples

```csharp

[C#]
if (shape.TopInch == 3)
    shape.TopInch = 1;
```
